news.title: Visa Partners with Yellow Card to Boost Stablecoin Use in Africa
news.body: Visa has joined forces with Yellow Card to explore stablecoin applications in Africa, aiming to enhance treasury operations and cross-border payments via Visa Direct. This collaboration underscores Visa's commitment to integrating digital currencies and expanding its financial services across the continent, potentially transforming payment landscapes in emerging markets.

news.title: Thailand Offers 5-Year Tax Break on Crypto Gains to Boost Economy
news.body: Thailand has introduced a five-year tax exemption on capital gains from cryptocurrency, effective June 17, to stimulate its digital economy and attract global crypto investors. This strategic move positions Thailand as a top destination for digital asset trading in Southeast Asia, potentially reshaping regional crypto markets.

news.title: JPMorgan Launches JPMD Stablecoin Amid Rising Digital Currency Demand
news.body: JPMorgan has unveiled JPMD, its own stablecoin, marking a significant shift for the banking giant towards embracing blockchain technology for secure, stable digital transactions. This development highlights the growing acceptance of digital currencies within traditional financial institutions, signaling a potential shift in how everyday transactions are conducted.

news.title: Highnote and BVNK Collaborate for Continuous Stablecoin Funding
news.body: Highnote has partnered with BVNK to offer real-time, 24/7 stablecoin-based funding for card programs, enhancing operational flexibility and efficiency. This partnership could revolutionize card issuers' funding mechanisms, offering a glimpse into the future of finance where digital currencies play a central role.

news.title: OSTTRA, Baton, and Partior Enhance FX Settlement with Tokenised Funds
news.body: OSTTRA and Baton Systems have integrated Partior into their FX settlement network, enabling 24/7 settlement of foreign exchange transactions with tokenised funds. This innovation enhances the flexibility and efficiency of currency trading, potentially setting new standards for global financial transactions.
